name: Sub Low
description:
LDNsoundproduction brings you sample pack number 4: ‘Sub Low’. A collection of sounds with a low, ambient and wobbly style that’s guaranteed to a add punch to your productions. Inspired by artists like Youngsta, Kryptic Minds and Biome, this pack contains 120 unique, high quality samples and loops.

Samples Include:

29 Atmospheric samples
33 Bass samples
30 Drum hits
28 Drum and percussion loops

All samples have been recorded at 140 bpm and in key A, so you know how to manipulate the samples however you need to.

All samples are also 24 bit and 44,100Khz, ensuring the highest quality audio possible. 

For sample previews, head to our soundcloud page:
https://soundcloud.com/ldnsoundproduction

*All sample pack brought direct from LDNsoundproduction (through big cartel), pay 20% less then our UK distributor price.*

name: Deeper and Darker
description:
LDNsoundproduction brings you Deeper and Darker, a collection of drum and bass samples with a darker edged sound. Inspired by artists like Noisia, Icicle and Octane and DLR, this pack contains 120 unique and individual digitally mastered samples samples.

Samples include:

32 atmospheric samples
25 bass samples
35 drum hits
28 drum loops

All samples are recorded at 174 bpm and root key C, allowing easy manipulation in any DAW.

Loop samples are also available in Apple loops and rex file formats.

All samples are also recorded in 24 bit and 44,100 hz, ensuring the highest audio quality for your music production.

For sample previews, head to our soundcloud page:
https://soundcloud.com/ldnsoundproduction

*All sample pack brought direct from LDNsoundproduction (through big cartel), pay 20% less then our UK distributor price.*

name: Ghetto Blaster
description:
LDNsoundproduction presents sample pack no. 2: ‘Ghetto Blaster’. This pack takes you back the to sampling culture of Hip-Hop, influenced by the sounds of the early to mid 90’s, and artists like Mobb Deep, Nas and Naughty by Nature.

Ghetto Blaster features 115 digitally mastered hits and loops, in WAVE(24bit, 44,100Hz), REX and Apple Loop formats. Suitable for use in any DAW, including Logic, Reason, Ableton Live, Pro Tools, FruityLoops, Cubase and ACID.

Samples include:

20 Drum Loops
30 Individual drum hits
20 Instrument loops
20 Individual sample hits
10 vocal cuts
15 bass hits and loops

This pack is ideal for rappers and mcs who want to piece together tracks quickly, or producers who want to improve their sound library.

All samples recorded at 97 bpm, and all bass and instrument loops recorded in E minor chord. Use your audio editor or sampler to change the tempo, or transpose the note accordingly. 

For sample previews, head to our soundcloud page:
https://soundcloud.com/ldnsoundproduction

*All sample pack brought direct from LDNsoundproduction (through big cartel), pay 20% less then our UK distributor price.*

name: 200 Dark and ambient samples
description:
LDNsoundproduction brings you 200 Dark and Ambient Samples, all you’ll need to add a dark or ambient edge to your tracks. This unique sample collection is suitable for techno, drum and bass, dubstep, trip-hop, minimal, tech-house and many more genres – ensuring a diversity you’re unlikely to find with any other sample pack.

Samples include:

39 bass sounds
42 pads
43 percussion hits
35 synth sounds
41 fx

All samples are 100% royalty free

All samples are recorded in ‘C’ key and at 120 BPM. This makes it easy to manipulate each sample to your desired tempo and key using your audio editor or sampler.

All samples are 16 bit, 44,100 Hz and in .wav format. Suitable for use in any DAW, including Logic, Reason, Ableton Live, Pro Tools, FruityLoops, Cubase and ACID.

For sample previews, head to our soundcloud page:
https://soundcloud.com/ldnsoundproduction

*All sample pack brought direct from LDNsoundproduction (through big cartel), pay 20% less then our UK distributor price.*
